headline: Is Exxon Mobil Corporation (XOM) A Promising Energy Stock According to Hedge Funds?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Most Promising Energy Stocks According to Hedge Funds. headline: Why Big Oil Doesn’t Mind Big Regulation
summary: Donald Trump  has promised to remove Biden-era regulatory barriers to drilling oil and gas, and that has become even easier with Republicans’ House majority.  Over the weekend, Trump nominated  Chris Wright,  an outspoken fossil-fuel champion, as energy secretary, further cementing the new administration’s pro-drilling stance.  Take methane emissions regulation, which the Trump administration might roll back.

headline: Oil Trader Faces Suit Over Company Hit by US-Iran Sanctions
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The energy trader seeking to buy UK gas assets from Shell Plc and Exxon Mobil Corp. was sued over allegations that he diverted money from an Iranian petrochemical company that was later banned from doing business in the US.Most Read from BloombergIn Cleveland, a Forgotten Streetcar Bridge Gets a Long-Awaited LiftAmtrak Wins $300 Million to Fix Its Unreliable NJ-to-NYC ServiceA Bug’s Eye View of Mexico City’s Modernist ArchitectureNYC Congestion Pricing Plan With $9 Toll to Start i
